name: @sap_oss/sap-customer-data-cloud-accelerator
description: A development environment for SAP Customer Data Cloud that enables the use of modern tools, such as JavaScript and source control.

scripts.test: cross-env CI=true npm run update-sap-cdc-toolkit && jest --collect-coverage --coverage --watch=all --coverageDirectory=coverage/unit ./cdc-accelerator/feature
scripts.build-old: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/*.js && node cdc-accelerator/build/build.js
scripts.deploy-old: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node cdc-accelerator/build/build.js && node cdc-accelerator/deploy/deploy.js
scripts.start-old: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node cdc-accelerator/build/build.js && light-server -c .lightserverrc
